line_1: On spring's sweet close, when fostering Nature strows
line_2: The earth with flowers, and all creation glows,

line_1: There o'er the hallow'd ground she fondly strows
line_2: Now on her darling Mira she bestows;

line_1: Sweet buds and blossoms on her bolster strows,
line_2: And binds his kerchief round her aching brows;
